content.title: Code Editor

activitySummary: The user is actively engaged in writing and navigating code within Visual Studio Code. The primary focus is on a class named 'CountStepsNotCompletedService' which appears to be part of a larger project related to job board cell analytics. The user is working on methods to count steps not completed and assign outputs based on various conditions. The code includes logic for handling different stages of an application process, such as 'Rejected', 'Cancelled', and 'Expired'. The user is also running multiple SOQL queries in the terminal to fetch developer names from a database, indicating a backend development task.

The user is working on a Salesforce project, as indicated by the presence of Salesforce-specific files and SOQL queries. The project involves modifying and analyzing classes and layouts related to job board cell analytics. The user is seen editing a file named 'Job_Board_Cell_Analytics__c-Job Board Cell Analytics Layout.layout-meta.xml' and running SOQL queries to retrieve data from the 'Country__mdt' object. The queries are executed to check the availability of developers from various countries, which is crucial for the project's requirements.

The user is utilizing the IntelliJ IDEA IDE for their development tasks. The IDE's interface shows multiple tabs open, including the 'CountStepsNotCompletedService.cls' file and several SOQL query tabs. The user is actively editing the code, adding and modifying logic to handle different application stages. The terminal panel at the bottom shows the execution of SOQL queries, with results displayed for developer availability from different countries. This indicates that the user is validating data and ensuring the correctness of their code logic.
aiUseSummary: The user is utilizing an AI_IDE_EXTENSION within IntelliJ IDEA. The AI tool is likely being used for code suggestions and possibly for debugging purposes. The presence of the AI chat interface in the IDE suggests that the user is leveraging AI to enhance their coding efficiency. The AI might be providing code snippets, suggesting improvements, or helping with complex logic implementations. This integration of AI tools within the IDE significantly boosts the user's productivity by offering real-time assistance and reducing the time spent on manual coding tasks.
